content.rendered:
For Dean Vasilakos, Head of Equities Portfolio Manager Tools, learning from the people on your team can help you maintain a competitive edge.

Learn more about our technology teams

excerpt.rendered: For Dean Vasilakos, Head of Equities Portfolio Manager Tools, learning from the people on your team can help you maintain a competitive edge.
